Package com.inrupt.client.rdf4j

Class RDF4JBodyPublishers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrupt.client.rdf4j.RDF4JBodyPublishers
  • public final class RDF4JBodyPublishers
extends Object
    Request.BodyPublisher implementations for use with RDF4J types.
